item.title: Recent publications
item.description: I’ve published across a range of topics in environmental and public health, principally on second-hand smoke and indoor air quality. Dobson R, Siddiqi K, Ferdous T, Ruque R, Lesosky M, Balmes J, Semple S. Diurnal variability of fine particulate pollution concentrations: data from 14 low and middle income countries. Int J Tuberc Lung Dis 2021 (accepted) Ferdous T, Siddiqi K, Semple S, Fairhurst C, Dobson R et al. Smoking behaviours and indoor air quality: a comparative analysis of smoking-permitted versus smoke-free homes in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
